ForceSSOURL.title: Force SSO URL
ForceSSOURL.description: Configure and lock the SSO URL. For example, hooli.zoom.us would be set as ForceSSOUrl=hooli

DisableAutoLaunchSSO.title: Disable Auto Launch SSO
DisableAutoLaunchSSO.description: Prevent Zoom from automatically launching the previously used SSO URL. This is useful for users with multiple accounts, each having their own SSO URL.

EnableAppleLogin.title: Enable Apple Login
EnableAppleLogin.description: Allow access to Apple login option.

DisableKeepSignedInWithSSO.title: Disable Keep Signed In With SSO
DisableKeepSignedInWithSSO.description: Require new SSO login upon client start

DisableKeepSignedInWithGoogle.title: Disable Keep Signed In With Google
DisableKeepSignedInWithGoogle.description: Require new Google login upon client start

DisableKeepSignedInWithFacebook.title: Disable Keep Signed In With Facebook
DisableKeepSignedInWithFacebook.description: Require new SSO login upon client start

EnableEmbedBrowserForSSO.title: Enable Embed Browser For SSO
EnableEmbedBrowserForSSO.description: Use embed browser in the client for SSO

EnforceSignInToJoin.title: Enforce Sign In To Join
EnforceSignInToJoin.description: Forces users to be signed in before joining a meeting from the app. Users can be signed-in on the web portal when joining through join URL.

EnforceAppSignInToJoin.title: Enforce App Sign In To Join
EnforceAppSignInToJoin.description: Require the client to be logged-in to a Zoom account before joining any meeting or webinar

SetWebDomain.title: Set Web Domain
SetWebDomain.description: Sets the web domain for logging in or joining a meeting. By default, the value is https://zoom.us or https://zoom.com

KeepSignedIn.title: Keep Signed In
KeepSignedIn.description: Keep the user signed in to the client when it is restarted (email login only)

zAutoUpdate.title: Auto Update
zAutoUpdate.description: Allow checking for updates through the client by users. When disabled, the Check for Updates button is also hidden. Note: This is not a true auto-update feature, this only allows the user to manually check for updates. Please see EnableSilentAutoUpdate

EnableSilentAutoUpdate.title: Enable Silent Auto Update
EnableSilentAutoUpdate.description: Allows the desktop client to silently check for available stable-version updates. This option requires AutoUpdate option to be enabled, and will fail if not enabled.

AlwaysCheckLatestVersion.title: Always Check Latest Version
AlwaysCheckLatestVersion.description: Allows the desktop client to check for any available updates. This option requires AutoUpdate option to be enabled, and will fail if not enabled.

SetUpdatingChannel.title: Set Updating Channel
SetUpdatingChannel.description: Allows the control of the cadence of updates applied to the desktop client. False (0): fewer updates and better stability. True (1): newest features and updates

disableDaemonInstall.title: Disable Daemon Install
disableDaemonInstall.description: Controls the use of the daemon helper to install updates, which bypasses the need to enter admin credentials when upgrading. This option requires AutoUpdate option to be enabled, and will fail if not enabled.

Login_Domain.title: Login Domain
Login_Domain.description: Set the email address domain that users can login with

DefaultUsePortraitView.title: Default Use Portrait View
DefaultUsePortraitView.description: Default to Portrait Mode upon opening Zoom

zDisableFT.title: Disable File Transfer
zDisableFT.description: Disable in-meeting file transfer. (sending or receiving)

DisableDirectShare.title: Disable Direct Share
DisableDirectShare.description: Disables direct share with Zoom Rooms option

PresentToRoomWithAudio.title: Present To Room With Audio
PresentToRoomWithAudio.description: Share sound when screen sharing to a Zoom Room

EnableHIDControl.title: Enable HID Control
EnableHIDControl.description: Enables HID control of USB audio devices from the Zoom client

EnableStartMeetingWithRoomSystem.title: Enable Start Meeting With Room System
EnableStartMeetingWithRoomSystem.description: Displays the Call Room System button on the home screen of the Zoom client

PresentToRoomOptimizeVideo.title: Present To Room Optimize Video
PresentToRoomOptimizeVideo.description: Client will optimize screen sharing for video clip when sharing directly to a Zoom Room.

PresentToRoomOption.title: Present To Room Option
PresentToRoomOption.description: Set sharing option when sharing directly to a Zoom Room. False - Show all sharing options. True - Automatically share desktop

PresentInMeetingOption.title: Present In Meeting Option
PresentInMeetingOption.description: Set sharing option when sharing directly to a Zoom Room within a meeting. False - Show all sharing options. True - Automatically share desktop

AlwaysShowVideoPreviewDialog.title: Always Show Video Preview Dialog
AlwaysShowVideoPreviewDialog.description: Always show the video preview when joining a meeting

BlockUntrustedSSLCert.title: Block Untrusted SSL Cert
BlockUntrustedSSLCert.description: Block connections to untrusted SSL certificates

EmbedUserAgentString.title: EmbedUser Agent String
EmbedUserAgentString.description: Embed a specified user agent string for all HTTP requests from Zoom client

IgnoreBandwidthLimits.title: Ignore Bandwidth Limits
IgnoreBandwidthLimits.description: Ignore bandwidth limited set on web settings. Useful for exceptions.

DisableZoomApps.title: Disable Zoom Apps
DisableZoomApps.description: Hide Zoom Apps quick launch button in the Zoom interface.
